TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit OtherItemDataCsv extends Microsoft.HealthVault.Thing.OtherItemData

Docs.summary: The OtherItemDataCSV class is used to store and retrieve data stored in the HealthVault comma-separated format.
Docs.remarks: It is not used directly but through a derived class that is specific to a thing type - for example, the ExerciseSamplesData class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class

MemberSignature.Value: protected OtherItemDataCsv (string data, string contentEncoding, string contentType);
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string data, string contentEncoding, string contentType) cil managed

Docs.param: The data to store in the other data section of the health record item.
The type of encoding that was done on the data. Usually this will be "base64" but other encodings are acceptable.
The MIME-content type of the data.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified data, encoding, and content type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class Microsoft.HealthVault.Thing.OtherItemDataCsvItem> GetAsDouble() cil managed

Docs.summary: Parses the comma-delimited data into a series of double values.
Docs.remarks: The collection contains two kinds of values. OtherItemDataCsvDouble items contain double values OtherItemDataCsvEscape items contain escapes

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class Microsoft.HealthVault.Thing.OtherItemDataCsvItem> GetAsString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Parse the comma-separated representation into an array of strings.
Docs.remarks: When this method returns, the Escapes collection will contain any escapes encountered during the parsing.
Docs.exception: If the content type is not "text/csv".
If the Data section is null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void SetOtherData(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Microsoft.HealthVault.Thing.OtherItemDataCsvItem> values) cil managed

Docs.param: The collection of values to store.
Docs.summary: Create the comma-delimited representation of a set of data and escapes.
Docs.remarks: The escapes are inserted into the comma-delimited list in the appropriate places. Any escape that occurs after the last element is ignored.
